{"id":1127040692,"question_id":3226,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1703385674,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1127040692/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number Game","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] numberGame(int[] nums) {\n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int n: nums){\n            list.add(n);\n            \n        }\n        \n         List<Integer> arr = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        Collections.sort(list);\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<list.size() ; i+=2){\n            int a = list.get(i);\n            int b = list.get(i+1);\n            \n            arr.add(b);\n            arr.add(a);\n        }\n        \n        \n        int[] res = new int[nums.length];\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length;i++){\n            res[i]=arr.get(i);\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
